inclusion.criterion: Symptomatic severe AVS referred for valve replacement (mechanic prosthesis or bioprosthesis) at Odense University Hospital
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: progressive SOB and LE edema, TTE revealed severe aortic stenosis with worsening LV function

exclusion.criterion: Moderate or severe LV systolic dysfunction (LVEF<40%)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patients already treated with ACE-I or ARB
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Unwilling to participate in the study
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: LVEF is below the threshold for exclusion, but patient's symptoms and echocardiographic findings suggest severe AVS. Signed informed consent status is unknown.
